entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make IMoveStaticMembersOptionsService available for VSMac #59936
    17.2
  • Refactoring is incorrect for dynamic types #59934
  • Edit Window Washed Out Unusable #59933
  • SyntaxContexts IsGlobalStatementContext should take file scoped namespaces into consideration #59931
    17.3
  • Add "Change namespace to match directory structure" refactoring that takes target namespace as input #59929
  • An easier way to execute 'Wrap every parameter -> Indent all parameters' #59927
  • indent guidelines Missing on C # #59926
  • Show exception description in C# XML documentation #59925
  • Automatically inserting code #59924
  • "Power" Member Rename to update Constructors and other References #59923
  • Remove implicit usings from newly generated classes #59922
  • Auto Formatting Column Mode #59921
  • Show generic collections in IntelliSense #59920
  • Remove out of context suggestions from IntelliSense #59919
  • Add "Inspect value destination" #59917
  • Reorder Intellisense method list based on method type (instance vs. extension) #59915
  • Typing a semicolon should move the cursor to the end of the statement #59913
  • Escape analysis inconsistency (CS8353) #59908
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException from SymbolFinder while using "change namespace to match folder structure" refactoring #59901
  • "Change namespace to match directory structure" refactoring issues #59899

Closed

  • The name of the generated event handler is invalid for generics classes. #59935
  • Use Pattern Matching Code Fix produces logically wrong results #59932
  • O/I icon should show base/derived classes/method in a tree #59918
  • Automatically wrap a long line upon hitting a semicolon #59911
  • Add angle-brackets automatically for generic arguments #59914
  • Simplify "View Call Hierarchy" #59916
  • KeyNotFoundException from Pythia.AbstractPythiaCompletionProvider.GetTextChangeAsync #59895

PullRequests

Created

  • Capability tracking #59938
    Area-Interactive
  • Require a matching regular operator for a checked operator #59937
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Source generators/fix exception latching #59930
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Avoid deadlock while loading ExtensionManagerPackage for integration tests #59910
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Correct indentation for action values (sub-items) #59909
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Editor namespaces refactoring - part 1 #59907
    Area-IDE
  • Break out embedded language classification (MEF side) #59905
    Area-IDE
  • Dev/rigibson/dogfood pnc #59904
    Area-Compilers
  • Update CodeStyle/format/SDK versions #59903
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Allow generate ctor intent to specify accessibility #59730
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.2.P2
  • Create attribute default arguments during binding #59750
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Bind declarations of checked conversion operators #59740
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Add quotes in string for clarity #59928
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Clean up diagnostic and solution crawler options - take 2 #59233
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Try to get dumps for VS hanging during initialization #59902
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • If we delete dump files, log as such #59906
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Simplify the simplification code. #59864
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59893
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Revert "Notify docs team for new breaking change documentation" #59900
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove unnecessary conditional logic from FlowAnalysisPass #59892
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59898
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59940
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59939
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add basic TS LSP server #59639
    Area-IDE
  • Port more flaky integration tests #59897
    Area-Infrastructure
  • only include entry points defined in source #59836
    Area-IDE
  • Filter to exact test class names in RunTests #59752
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix handling for source generated documents in LSIF #59891
    Area-IDE
  • Exclude object's methods from ref struct completion list #59884
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Apply source-build patches #58727
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix more lock contention #59638
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P2
  • Additional tests for pattern matching on `Span<char>` #59876
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix pattern based arguments in ForEachLoopOperationInfo without binding assumptions #59887
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Always try to use cached data for import completion even if outdated #59760
    Area-IDE
  • Main attributes for simple programs #59471
    Area-Compilers
  • Break out embedded language classification entirely from normal classification #59896
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Fix speculative semantic model scenarios #59767
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add new feature to fix invalid constraints. #59889
    Area-IDE, Feature Request
  • Push the two-step navigation system further through roslyn. #59802
    Area-IDE
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0-macos #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Codeaction diagnostics #59787
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Use the same codepath for computing light-bulb actions to determine if hte lightbulb shoudl appear at all. #59599
    Area-IDE
